description: This file defines a Python module that demonstrates how to use AI agents with structured output for generating movie script concepts. It includes class definitions, agent configurations, and example usage for different locations.

classes.name: MovieScript
classes.description: A Pydantic model representing the structure of a movie script concept, including setting, ending, genre, name, characters, and storyline.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method of the Agent class used to generate and output a movie script concept based on a location prompt.
